post.text: "The right wing has thrown everything they possibly can at her, and what does she do? ...She gets back up and she gets back in the fight." â€”Elizabeth Warren endorsing Hillary on The Rachel Maddow Show

comment.author: Jennifer
comment.text: I'm still undecided whether or not to write-in or support someone whom I have deep disagreements with, but if Hillary were to pick Warren as a VP, then that would be a ticket that I would get behind. They would balance each other well and be a force to reckon with.

replies.author: Catherine
replies.text: If isn't registered as a write-in in your municipality, then the vote won't count. Please don't throw your vote away.

replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: writing in is a vote for DRUMP

replies.author: Jennifer
replies.text: Catherine Not how it works in my state. You can write-in , I've checked.

replies.author: Jalynn
replies.text: We can't write in when we have the Republicans to beat. We have to unite. I respect Mr. Sanders too. ðŸ˜€

replies.author: Alexander
replies.text: VOTE Democrat Hillary Clinton for POTUS!
